title: ** Login to the website with valid credentials
preconditions: User knows username and password for the website
main_flow: User sees a message indicating the site requires authentication
User inputs username "admin" into the Username field
4. User inputs password "admin" into the Password field
5. User clicks the Sign in button
6. User is redirected to a new page with two headers
Congratulations! You must have the proper credentials.
If the user enters invalid credentials, the system will display an error message.
If the user forgets their password, they can click on the "Forgot password" link to reset their password.
postconditions: User is logged into the website
User can access the website features
